messages.textToSpeech: How else can I help you?

messages.speech: Making the migration to the cloud is fast becoming a hot topic for most financial services organizations as they look to leverage more agility, operational efficiency and reduce their time to market. This session will cover a number of key business and technology considerations for financial institutions considering a move to the cloud. The discussion will include a review of the industry trends, business drivers and challenges, and key considerations for adoption.
